Author: thecalcographer
Text: 🙋🏼‍♀️🙋🏼‍♀️🙋🏼‍♀️ when I’m in ED mode I’m on top of things. I exercise, I meditate, I read, I work on my projects, I eat healthily, I go out, I maintain my social connections... and then when I lose that I just sort of flop and become useless and don’t do anything at all.  So I have a hard time giving up my ED behaviours even though I know the constant worrying and checking and weighing drives me nuts, because the rest of my life is always super good and happy during those times.
